titleStmt.title: Joseph C. G. Kennedy to James F. Robinson
CWG7645

availability.p: This image and transcription is publicly accessible. The image appears courtesy of the repository named in the Source Description. The transcription and annotation were undertaken by Kentucky Historical Society staff, volunteers, and interns. If referencing this document title, accession number, and permanent URL.

seriesStmt.title: Civil War Governors of Kentucky Digital Documentary Edition
Early Access

msIdentifier.repository: Kentucky Department for Libraries and Archives
msIdentifier.collection: Office of the Governor, James F. Robinson: Governor's Official Correspondence File, 1862-1863

body.p:
Census Office, Department of the Interior,
Washington, March 18th 1863.
His Excellency James F. Robinson,
Governor of the State of Kentucky.
Sir:

To enable me to prepare for the War Department a map defining the Congressional Districts of the United States, I am under the necessity of requesting that you will at the earliest moment possible direct that there be prepared and forwarded to this Office, a list of the counties or other divisions comprising the several Congressional Districts, numerically arranged, of your State for the 38th Congress,

I have the honor to be
Very Respectfully
Jos C G Kennedy
Superintendent
